snippet: Texas and Oklahoma will play annually at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas until 2025 after the universities agreed to a five-year extension of their rivalry.
abstract: Texas and Oklahoma agree to play annually at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas until 2025, after agreeing to five-year extension of their rivalry.
lead_paragraph: Texas and Oklahoma will play annually at the Cotton Bowl in Dallas until 2025 after the universities agreed to a five-year extension of their rivalry.

headline.main: Oklahoma and Texas Extend Showdown Deal
headline.print_headline: Longer Stay in Dallas for Oklahoma-Texas
